Verses: 1 adharkuppinbu, Ummudaiya Thagappanaarukku Varuththamaayirukkiradhu Endru Yoseppukkuch Sollappattadhu. Appozhudhu Avan Than Irandu Kumaararaagiya Manaaseyaiyum Eppiraayeemaiyum Thannodekoodak Konduponaan.
2 idho, Ummudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Yoseppu Ummidaththil Vandhirukkiraar Endru Yaakkobukku Arivikkappattadhu; Appozhudhu Isravel Thannaiththidappaduththikkondu, Kattilinmel Utkaarndhaan.
3 yaakkobu Yoseppai Nokki: Sarvavallamaiyulla Dhevan Kaanaan Dhesaththilulla Loos Ennum Idaththil Enakkuth Dharisanamaagi, Ennai Aaseervadhiththu:
4 naan Unnaip Palugavum Perugavum Panni, Unnaip Pala Janakkoottamaakki, Unakkup Pinvarum Un Sandhadhikku Indhath Dhesaththai Niththiya Sudhandharamaagak Koduppen Endru Ennode Sonnaar.
5 naan Unnidaththil Egipthukku Varumunne Unakku Egipthudhesaththil Pirandha Un Irandu Kumaararum Ennudaiya Kumaarar; Roopan Simiyon Enbavargalaippola, Eppiraayeemum Manaaseyum Ennudaiyavargal.
6 ivargalukkuppin, Nee Perum Pillaigal Unnudaiyavargal; Avargal Thangal Thangal Sagodhararudaiya Peraal Azhaikkappattu Avargalukkuriya Sudhandharaththil Panguperuvaargal.

7 naan Padhaanai Vittu Varugaiyil, Kaanaandhesaththil Eppiraaththaavukkuk Konjam Thooram Irukkumbodhu, Vazhiyile Raakel Ennandaiyil Maranamadaindhaal; Avalai Ange Bedhlakem Ennum Eppiraaththaa Oorukkup Pogira Vazhiyile Adakkampanninen Endraan.
8 isravel Yoseppin Kumaararaip Paarththu: Ivargal Yaar Endru Kettaan.
9 yoseppu Than Thagappanai Nokki: Ivargal Ivvidaththil Dhevan Enakku Arulina Kumaarar Endraan. Appozhudhu Avan: Naan Avargalai Aaseervadhikkumbadi Avargalai En Kittakkonduvaa Endraan.

10 mudhirvayadhinaal Isravelin Kangal Mangalaayirundhabadiyaal, Avan Nandraaip Paarkkakkoodaadhirundhadhu. Avargalai Avanandaiyile Serappanninaan; Appozhudhu Avan Avargalai Muththamcheydhu Anaiththukkondaan.
11 isravel Yoseppai Nokki: Un Mugaththaik Kaanben Endru Naan Ninaikkavillai; Aanaalum, Idho, Un Sandhadhiyaiyum Kaanumbadi Dhevan Enakku Arulseydhaar Endraan.
12 appozhudhu Avanudaiya Muzhangaalgal Naduve Irundha Pillaigalai Yoseppu Pinnidappanni, Avanudaiya Mugaththukku Munbaagath Tharaimattum Kunindhu Vananginaan.

13 pinbu, Yoseppu Avviruvaraiyum Konduvandhu, Eppiraayeemaith Than Valadhu Kaiyinaale Isravelin Idadhu Kaikku Neraagavum, Manaaseyaith Than Idadhu Kaiyinaale Isravelin Valadhu Kaikku Neraagavum Vittaan.

14 appozhudhu Isravel, Manamariya, Than Valadhu Kaiyai Neetti, Ilaiyavanaagiya Eppiraayeemudaiya Thalaiyinmelum, Manaase Mooththavanaayirundhum, Than Idadhu Kaiyai Manaaseyudaiya Thalaiyinmelum Vaiththaan.
15 avan Yoseppai Aaseervadhiththu: En Pidhaakkalaagiya Aabiragaamum Eesaakkum Vazhipattu Vanangiya Dhevanum, Naan Pirandha Naalmudhal Innaalvaraikkum Ennai Aadhariththuvandha Dhevanum,

16 ellaath Theemaikkum Neengalaakki Ennai Meetta Thoodhanumaanavar Indhap Pillaigalai Aaseervadhippaaraaga, En Perum En Pidhaakkalaagiya Aabiragaam Eesaakku Enbavargalin Perum Ivargalukku Idappadakkadavadhu; Boomiyil Ivargal Migudhiyaaip Perugakkadavargal Endraan.

17 thagappan Than Valadhukaiyai Eppiraayeemudaiya Thalaiyinmel Vaiththadhai Yoseppu Kandu, Adhu Thanakkup Piriyamillaadhabadiyaal, Eppiraayeemudaiya Thalaiyinmel Irundha Than Thagappanudaiya Kaiyai Manaaseyinudaiya Thalaiyinmel Vaikkumbadikku Eduththu:
18 en Thagappane, Appadiyalla, Ivan Mooththavan, Ivanudaiya Thalaiyin Mel Ummudaiya Valadhukaiyai Vaikkavendum Endraan.

19 avan Thagappano Thaduththu: Adhu Enakkuth Theriyum, En Magane, Enakkuth Theriyum; Ivanum Oru Janakkoottamaavaan, Ivanum Peruguvaan; Ivanudaiya Thambiyo Ivanilum Adhigamaaip Peruguvaan; Avanudaiya Sandhadhiyaar Thiralaana Janangalaavaargal Endraan.

20 ivvidhamaaga Avan Andraithdhinam Avargalai Aaseervadhiththu: Dhevan Unnai Eppiraayeemaippolavum Manaaseyaippolavum Aakkuvaaraaga Endru Isravelar Unnai Munnittu Vaazhththuvaargal Endru Solli, Eppiraayeemai Manaasekku Munne Vaiththaan.
21 pinbu, Isravel Yoseppai Nokki: Idho, Naan Maranamadaiyappogiren; Dhevan Ungalode Iruppaar; Avar Ungal Pidhaakkalin Dhesaththukku Ungalaith Thirumbavum Pogappannuvaar Endrum,
22 un Sagodhararukku Koduththadhaippaarkkilum, Naan En Pattayaththaalum, En Villinaalum, Emoriyar Kaiyilirundhu Sambaadhiththa Oru Nilaththai Unakku Adhigamaana Pangaagak Koduththen Endrum Sonnaan.
